Name: Piccadilly Martini
Ingredients: 1.25 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A classic 2:1 Dry Martini tempered by a hint of pomegranate and absinthe.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock 's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Piccadilly Martini contains 156 calories
